lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "We plan to export 100,000 cars this year and 200,000 next year and with our present production facilities we cannot produce this amount," an official from Daewoo Motor Co Ltd, who requested anonymity, told Reuters.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A Hyundai Motor Co official, who asked not to be identified, said, "We basically see the measure as positive, for we can raise money in the capital market by issuing new shares or convertible bonds which will eventually improve our financial structure."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "Many firms prefer to borrow from banks rather than boost capital by issuing shares so that they can evade new dividend pressure," a bank official said.
